content.label: Probably one of my favorite games on my phone.
wow no iphone 5 support.
It's very addicting and fun. I'm in the final world and the levels are very hard.

concrats on the game it is so amazing the gameplay is well thought up please make a soosiz 2 or update to make this game glorious, make it compatible with iPhone 5s, please do them, this is a great game I would hate to see it die out..
I bought this game years ago, now installing it again, looking forward to replay. True piece of art.
Itz super fun but it always makes my lil bro cry cuz he cant figure it out.
But I want update
está súper,
Fun game when your bored if your into Nintendo style kids games that is.....wish I knew before I bought it someone recommended this to me after I beat swordigo not even close to similar....
iPhone 5 support, pleeeeease!!!!!!!!!

This is still the very best game ever made for iOS. Even considering the fact that it hasn't been updated in awhile. It is the only game that provides a complete experiences that rivals that of the PSP and 3DS.

I only wish that the developer would create a sequel. I'd honestly pay console prices for it.
This is the worst game ever it gave me such a headach. Such a cheat when u jump it wont let you sometimes. Get but gont get this app.....!!
I love this game! Please make for iphone 5!!!!
Good game, but its not compatible yet with iPhone 5 resolution. Please fix this.
So funny and creative!

To start, I'm not the hugest fan of the art style or music, but the fact the I've still rated it five stars should speak for the incredible, addicting, and polished GAMEPLAY. (on a pleasant side note, the game gives a great iPod music toggle on startup). Awesome platforming with creative level design and a smooth, intuitive difficulty curve. Hours of quality entertainment for a dollar, this is a burglary.

title.label: the only best platform game app ever!

content.label: I am so addicted to this game. When i first bought the iphone 3gs, this was the second game  app i dwnloaded (angry birds was first, lol.)and also my first experience using a smartphone and using the app store for the first time. such sweet memories that i will never forget :-) this game app will always be a favorite of mine <3
I bought this without hesitation, because of Swordigo, Wow !! This game is boring compared to Swordigo. Work on Swordigo 2 !!!!!!!!!
Tis is sooo addicting I love it best game ever get it now. HAS ANYONE PASSED THE MOON LEVEL YET cause I haven't.:)
This game is so fun! The graphics are great and the gameplay is amazing!
Second best game ever for iPod, and the first is swordigo. Make swordigo 2, 3, and 4 please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have fun playing this game

I loved Swordigo from the same company so i decided to buy this one. I played to level 4 and then quit. Its interesting but not addictive. I was bored the whole  time while playing it, not a good sign. I cant recommend this game. At least not the first 4 levels. If you havent played Swordigo, it better and for free.
Fun game, and cute music. Only complaint is the fact that I get a little light headed from the world constantly spinning, i can only play this game in short intervals lol
Great game! Please add more levels. 🐷
Best game for the iPhone/iPod touch ever made.

title.label: Yaaaay I got it for a buck ! 👍😁😊

content.label: Great game ! Just need a better story. Well I barely started so it might get better later on 😁 hopefully ! TouchFoo you never let me down.. Make Swordigo 2 !!!!!!!!
Best game ever!!!!!!!!!!!!
Best game ever
Omg! This is the best game ever!! I love that this game is so long! I just can't explain how fun it is!

Love it! Awesome graphic design, awesome  music, and of course awesome game! Levels become harder and harder than what you can expect! Took me forever and still can't complete one of the blue coins level! T_T

title.label: One of the best games i have...

content.label:
A great buy. For all you mario galaxy lovers, this game is a 2D version of it almost exactly. Very fun and challenging. I have grown to like Touch Foo a lot!!! they are my second only to Gameloft!!! I really like the bosses in this game too

Overall: 9
Gameplay: 10
Graphics: 9
Lasting Appeal: 8
Sound: 8
Controls: 10

Great level design…
Great graphics…
Just plain amazing game.

BTW 66 levels is more than you think… I am on World 4 and it has been months!

This company makes the best games! Please continue to make more games! :D
PS:
Swordigo is amazing too!

For an app store game, this thing is awesome. It is also kinda long... Not just kinda, very. I love it. It gets a bit monotonous after the star levels because of the loss of the sticking to platforms, for a while. I recommend it greatly, though.

Overall in general it is an outstanding, extraordinary game. It's kind of like Mario how you can jump from planet to planet. MARIO GALAXYYYYYYYYYY oh and has anyone else noticed the Christmas music at the end of each level? Well yeah, so in general this game is boss of the bauzes, really, amazingly fun and addictive. My brother wouldn't give me back my iPod when he tried this game…

Since I got swordigo for free and was blown away I wanted to support touch foo and went ahead and bought this game. I absolutely love it! It has a Mario feel but it does have original concept to it with an angry birds space mechanism. I rec. you get this game if you have swordigo it's fun and really hard. Already at level 4 and died 3 times lol!
best ios game

How often do you find a truly new style of game play and a well executed game all in one? Pretty much once per major game platform, but the programmers/designers at TouchFoo nailed it here, big time! Just realized the did Swordingo, too, which is another epic victory for iPhone gamers.
Addicting :)

Such an amazing game - I love playing it.  The graphics and animation are beautiful and smooth.  The soundtrack is great.  Fun gameplay concept.  Any chance there will be more levels or an iPad-optimized version?
Wow! Extraordinary game quite like Super Mario Galaxy! A must-have for all Mario fans!
Even though I beat it, I'm still keeping it. When I have nothing to do, I go on soosiz and it makes my day. Good job, awesome game!

This is an amazing app and great graphics. 
The only downsider is the price, $2 is a bit much but if thats the price for the amazing graphics then let it be :)
Wish I had discovered this years ago!!  Keep up the great work!
Amazing game! Love, love, love it! It will be one of those apps you keep forever!
Need I say more?
Super Mario Galaxy-type platformer with softcore difficulty and cute retro graphics.  Gotta collect coins what can I say?
Great whimsical game that can be a five minute time-killer or immersion for an hour. The aesthetics and story are very cute as is the music.

This really is one of the top 3 best games I've ever played on the iPhone. Can't figure out why they don't make a follow up game for it or why this isn't more popular. Much more creative than Angry Birds!
